text: Sε wͻ’hyia wͻn a wͻ’agye adie no a deε wͻ’ka ne sε: “Yεgye di”. Sε εka wͻn ho wͻn ho nko ara nso a, deε wͻ’ka ne sε: “Mone wͻn redi (Muhammad ho Adiyisεm) a Nyankopͻn ayi ama mo (wͻ mo Nwoma no mu) no ho nkͻmmͻ ama wͻ’de ayε nyinasoͻ atia mo wͻ mo Wura Nyankopͻn anim (wͻ Atemmuda)? Adεn monni adwen
